title: Accessibility information for web authors
summary: Guide to accessibility semantics defined by the Accessible Rich Internet Application (ARIA) specification to create accessible web experiences. Describes how to apply accessibility semantics to common design patterns and widgets, providing design patterns and functional examples.
pageTitle: Accessibility information for web authors - Accessibility | MDN
